item.title: Tomcat load balancing with mod_proxy and mod_proxy_balancer
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to load balancing two Tomcat instances with Apache HTTPD server with mod_proxy and mod_proxy_balancer modules. The environment will be simulated with three virtual machines and VirtualBox: # Server FQDN IP 1 apache-server.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.101 Apache HTTPD - Port 80 2 tomcat-server1.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.102 Apache Tomcat - Port 8080 3 tomcat-server2.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.103 Apache Tomcat - Port 8080 Check the following post to configure openSUSE with Internet and statick IP address by using YaST on VirtualBox

item.title: How to install Apache HTTPD in openSUSE
